subtitle: today is day four of the Omer where we
utilize the concepts of hasid which is
love and Netta which is endurance
love is the strongest force of the world
and the longest lasting
if I had a genie wish it would be that
all people knew the power of love
the cosmic energy spreads out and gets
absorbed by every living being
studies show that plants grow better
when given love
it's known that babies Thrive when given
love and all of us need and embrace love
love is forever
love that is given endures throughout
history sometime it fades sometimes it
fades from our perception
but it lasts through time and space
so let's use this day to add some of
that beautiful magic of love into this
world
